content: The URL used for the single logout on the Identity provider side

comment.text: The "SPSingleLogoutURLTooltip" translation key provides a tooltip message explaining the purpose of the "SPSingleLogoutURL" field in the Portal Settings UI. It is used to inform users about the URL associated with single logout on the Identity provider side when setting up Single Sign-On (SSO) options, typically displayed in a button or dialog context.

usage.context:
<MetadataUrlField
 labelText={t("SPSingleLogoutURL")}
 name="spSingleLogoutUrl"
 placeholder={`${url}/sso/slo/callback`}
 tooltipContent={
 <Text fontSize="12px">{t("SPSingleLogoutURLTooltip")}</Text>
 }
 tooltipClass="sp-single-logout-url-tooltip icon-button"
 />
 
 <div className="button-wrapper">

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'عنوان رابط المستخدم لتسجيل الخروج الفردي من جانب مزود الهوية' is a literal translation and doesn't flow naturally in Arabic. It's overly verbose and technical for a tooltip.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: تسجيل الخروج من الهوية

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'من جانب مزود الهوية' (from the side of the Identity Provider) is unnecessarily explicit. The meaning is implied.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: تسجيل الخروج من الهوية

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL şəxsiyyət provayderi tərəfində tək çıxış üçün istifadə olunur' is a literal translation and could be improved for clarity and naturalness in Azerbaijani. It's a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL şəxsiyyət təminatçısı tərəfindən tək avtorizasiyadan (single logout) çıxış üçün istifadə olunur.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the sentence structure could be more idiomatic. Azerbaijani often prefers a more active voice or rearranging the sentence to flow better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Şəxsiyyət təminatçısı tərəfindən istifadə olunan tək çıxış URL.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'отписване' is a valid translation of 'logout' in this context, but 'излизане' might be more common and natural-sounding.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL адресът, използван за единично излизане от страна на доставчика на идентичност

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The German word 'einmalige' is often used for 'single' in the context of logout. While technically correct, 'einzige' might be more natural and commonly used in this context, emphasizing uniqueness.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Die URL, die für die einzige Abmeldung auf der Seite des Identitätsanbieters verwendet wird.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Kertakirjautumisessa käytetty URL identiteetintarjoajan puolella' is technically correct but could be improved for clarity and naturalness. 'Identiteetintarjoajan puolella' is a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kertakirjautumiseen käytetty URL identiteetintarjoajalla

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the phrasing could be more consistent with typical UI text. Separating the URL description and location could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kertakirjautumiseen käytetty URL. Identiteetintarjoajan osoite.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'դուրս գալու' can be more accurately translated as 'անջատվելու'. 'Դուրս գալու' implies a physical exit, while 'անջատվելու' is more appropriate for a logout action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL-ն, որն օգտագործվում է Identity մատակարարի կողմից անջատվելու համար

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation doesn't fully capture the meaning of "Identity provider side." It literally translates to 'side of the Identity provider'. A more accurate translation would convey the meaning of 'Identity provider's side' or 'Identity provider'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL ທີ່ໃຊ້ສໍາລັບການອອກຈາກລະບົບດຽວຢູ່ຝ່າຍຜູ້ໃຫ້ບໍລິການ Identity

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Vietrādis' seems to be a typo. It should likely be 'Vietnes'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vietnes

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'atteikšanai' is a bit formal for this context. A more natural and user-friendly phrasing might be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: atlaišanai

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English term 'Identity provider' is translated as 'identitātes nodrošinātāja'. While accurate, the term 'identitātes pakalpojuma sniedzēja' might be more commonly understood.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: identitātes pakalpojuma sniedzēja

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'De URL die wordt gebruikt voor het eenmalig uitloggen aan de kant van de Identity provider' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness. 'Eenmalig uitloggen' is correct but potentially clunky. A more fluent translation would convey the meaning better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: De URL voor single logout op de Identity provider.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the translation could benefit from closer alignment with the English phrasing in terms of simplicity. The original is a more complex sentence structure.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: De URL voor het uitloggen via de Identity provider.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "O URL utilizado para o término de sessão único no lado do Fornecedor da Identidade" is a bit literal and could be improved for clarity and naturalness in Portuguese. 'Término de sessão' is a more technical term. A more common and understandable translation would be 'desligamento de sessão'. Also, 'Fornecedor da Identidade' can be simplified to 'provedor de identidade'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O URL utilizado para o desligamento de sessão no provedor de identidade.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a hyphenated URL (URL-адрес). While not strictly incorrect, URLs are usually written as one word in modern usage.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL-адрес -> URL-адрес

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'අනන්‍යතා ප්‍රතිපාදකයාගේ පස තනි නික්මීම සඳහා මෙම ඒ.ස.නි. භාවිතා කරයි' is not an accurate reflection of the English content 'The URL used for the single logout on the Identity provider side'. It literally translates to 'This URL is used by the Identity provider's side for single exit'. It doesn't convey the purpose of the URL (to be used *for* single logout).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation could be: 'අනන්‍යතා සපයින්නයාගේ ඒකතනි නික්මීම් සදහා භාවිතා වන URL මෙයයි' or 'මෙය අනන්‍යතා සපයින්නයා විසින් සිදුකරනු ලබන ඒකතනි නික්මීම් සදහා යෙදෙන URL'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation uses a mix of formal and informal language. Maintaining a consistent tone is preferable, especially for technical documentation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Review and standardize the language to match the technical context. Consider replacing informal words with more formal equivalents if appropriate.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'identitete' should be 'identitete'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: identitete

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation is not entirely accurate. "једнострано одјављивање" literally translates to 'one-sided logout', which isn't the intended meaning. It should convey the idea of 'single logout'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL који се користи за једнократно одјављивање на страни Идентитетског пружаоца

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Идентитетског' is misspelled. The correct spelling is 'Идентитетског'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Идентитетског

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'постачальника' could be more accurately rendered as 'провайдера' for better technical consistency. While 'постачальника' is not incorrect, 'провайдера' is more common in IT contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: провайдера

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '用于身份供应商端单点登出的 URL' while technically correct, is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness. 'Identity provider side' is translated very directly. A more natural phrasing would focus on the *provider's* logout functionality.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 身份提供商的单点登出 URL
